Translations.Text: Tumhi sanguna taka ki he inkari lokanno
Na mi upasana karato tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Na tumhi upasana karanare ahata tyaci, jyaci mi upasana karato
Ani na mi upasana karena tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Ani na tumhi tyaci upasana karala, jyaci mi upasana karato
Tumacyasathi tumaca dina (dharma) ahe ani majhyasathi majha dina (dharma) ahe
